_xResult.title: Georgette Kaftan
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made maxi dress with fun pattern
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made kaftan/caftan has us dreaming of trips along the Greek isle and days spent under the Spanish sun. This made to measure maxi dress is perfectly oversized, with sleeves that taper from bottom to top and a beautiful patterned stripe down the back. The rest of the dress is graced with an orange and black pattern that is instantly eye-catching.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
